thread.title: BRIEF-H&R Amends NCIB To Repurchase For Cancellation Up To An Additional 10 Mln Stapled Units

title: BRIEF-H&R Amends NCIB To Repurchase For Cancellation Up To An Additional 10 Mln Stapled Units
text: March 14, 2018 / 7:54 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-H&R Amends NCIB To Repurchase For Cancellation Up To An Additional 10 Mln Stapled Units Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 14 (Reuters) - H&R Real Estate Investment Trust : * H&R AMENDS ITS NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID TO REPURCHASE FOR CANCELLATION UP TO AN ADDITIONAL 10 MILLION OF ITS STAPLED UNITS * H&R REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - ANNOUNCED RECEIPT OF FINAL APPROVAL FROM TSX TO AMEND ITS EXISTING NCIB * H&R REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT - AMEND EXISTING NCIB TO INCREASE STAPLED UNITS MAY BE REPURCHASED FOR CANCELLATION FROM 5, MILLION TO 15 MILLION STAPLED UNITS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
